headline: THERMOTRON TEMPERATURE AND HUMIDITY CHAMBER -18ºC to 110°C

specstable:
Manufacturer Thermotron
Model SM-3.5S
Minimum Temperature -18 ºC (-0 ºF, 255.00 ºK)
Maximum Temperature 110 ºC (230 ºF, 383 ºK)
Humidity Range 20% to 98%
Temperature Control
Control Stability ± 1.100 ºC
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Overtemperature Protection YES
Chart Recorder Circular-Two Pen
Controller Manufacturer/Model Thermotron 2800
Capacity/Volume Box 3.30 cu ft (0.09 cu m)
Chamber Characteristics
Chamber Construction Stainless steel
Number and Size of Access Ports 2"-Left side
Chamber Size
Width 16.00 in (40.64 cm)
Depth 18.00 in (45.72 cm)
Height 20.00 in (50.80 cm)
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Refrigerant Type & Quantity Suva R-409A
Other Information Chamber performance, 25°C ambient, no heat load (ideal circumstance)
Cooling: +25°C to -10°C in 50 minutes
Heating: +25°C to +65°C in 15 minutes
Heating: +25°C to +110°C in 60 minutes
Power Requirements 115 V 20.0 A 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 55.000 in (139.7 cm)
Depth 32.000 in (81.3 cm)
Height 48.000 in (121.9 cm)
